Today we sign the bill that establishes the Food Solidarity Bonus, which will benefit more than 7 million Chileans.
This bonus consists of $ 40,000 per family, plus $ 7,500 for each child (child or grandchildren). It is not a total solution but it is an important relief.
We ask Congress to approve this project as soon as possible to be able to deliver this bond in July.

Yesterday we celebrated in Arica the publication of the Law of Polimetales that will mean a great help and benefits for the affected families.
Ariqueñas families affected by polymetales will receive subsidies for housing, health care and support for their student children.
It is what thousands of families who have suffered so much deserve and who, for long years, waited for a concrete solution to their problems.

As an independent country, Azerbaijan is also pursuing an independent policy today. This independent policy is primarily based on the will of the Azerbaijani people.
The people of Azerbaijan and Azerbaijan are an integral part of the Islamic world. This is our history, our tradition, our national identity.
Our national values ​​are based on Islamic values. We have a lot of national values ​​(cont) http://t.co/qqY52RBC
We must preserve, promote and propagate the rich national spiritual values ​​and traditions of the Azerbaijani people.
In international organizations, almost absolute majority of Muslim countries are Azerbaijan (cont) http://t.co/DO5Puohw
We also take practical steps to strengthen Islamic solidarity. Various events held in Baku are a clear indication of this.
Our independent policy will further strengthen and we will be more active in the processes going on in the region.
At present we are exploring new continents politically and diplomatically for ourselves.
We now have very good relations with Latin America.
Two of the three countries that recognize Khojaly genocide are Latin American countries.
Mexico, Colombia and Pakistan are our fraternal countries.
Perhaps slowly, but surely, all criminals will be brought to justice.
We will further expand our foreign policy, diversifying it with economic terms.
Our greatest achievement over these years is that we have not turned from the path of independence.
Today Azerbaijan is developing as an independent country. From our development, of course, Azerbaijani citizens and friends are benefiting from it.
After that, the independence of Azerbaijan will be eternal, and then Azerbaijan will go only through development.

Today we present a State Policy, permanent and comprehensive, so that our elderly have a healthier aging.
It will include a home care plan, day care centers and grants to centers that welcome non-autovalent older adults
Because although old age can be hard, it does not have to be a threat to the dignity and well-being of our vulnerable older adults.
